reviews.review: поставил портал, и оказался в Чечне 10000/10 нaxyй
One of the best puzzle games anyone can ever play !

Probably my favorite puzzle game of all time. Excellent single player and co-op. Single player is rife with comedy. Co-op expands on the great puzzles of the single-player portion. This is a must-have for any gamer.
Классная головоломка, Уитли очень смешное и Глэдос тоже, всем советаю
Very enjoyable game, great and funny story. Best with friend
Juegazo! aun despues de terminarlo lo sigo jugando es mucho mejor que el primero que tambien es bueno pero este tiene mapas de la comunidad lo cual lo hace aun mejor y el cooperativo.
Very cool! I like the plot twist of the story
A decently challenging game. Liked the 1st part. Loved the 2nd one.

This is all about science and Apeture Science made my day go extremely STRONG!
Thank you :3 -Sebastian Morazan!
虽说是2011年的游戏，画面放到2020年并不过时，背景音乐、关卡的设计都比现在大多数的游戏优秀很多，剧情放到现在可能有点老套，但放在2011年应该非常棒，综合来说，无论过了多长时间，这都是是一部神作。

Portal 2 is a masterpiece of a game. It’s funny and charming but at times touching and deep. This is why it has managed to stick with so many people of its amazing ten years of life. The Portal duology is in my mind and in so many other’s minds one of the greatest game series of all time. I truly and full heartedly recommend the Portal games. But if not both at least Portal 2.
They do what they must because they can
You simply have to play this game and make up your own mind.
its good very fun to play and cool robots
Nice game to work the brain lol

Um jogo que, apesar de ser uma continuação, não requer conhecimento prévio! Como o primeiro traz consigo muita simplicidade, praticidade, diversão e desafios! A história é animada e te faz rir muito! Um jogo excelente para descontrair. Super recomendo!
I loved the first iteration of the game, and the second did not disappoint.  I especially love the 2 player co-op, it is both friendship making and breaking, and a TON of fun!
Bitene kadar İllallah ettim ama güzeldi.

This is a fun game and a better portal
I do have game crashes in co-op sometimes but thats ok
very nice. captured the "physics" quite well.
its so fun and addictive lol

Ha sido una grata experiencia. llevaba tiempo este juego en la lista. La variedad de puzzles hace que el juego nunca se haga demasiado pesado. Y los diálogos son maravillosos. El juego que hace con la dinamica de los portales es sublime.

Um jogo simplesmente incrível, o coop nem se fala, o ponto mais forte do jogo, compre junto de um amigo e passe várias horas se divertindo com os puzzles, após terminar a campanha é possível baixar novas pela oficina.
Amazing story, dialogue, characters, gameplay, and co op. Also the community chambers are fun. Buy on sale you won't regret it.
Хорошая игра ,всем советую. Заставляет поработать мозгом. Интересные отсылки и классный сюжет.
You can't go wrong with Portal 2. It's Portal 2. IT"S GREAT

Отличная головоломка, но есть минусы...
Слышу голос ГЛаДОС чаще, чем голос бога...

e a mema coisa so que no futuro e a lore e que voce e o unioc que ta vivo oee todo mundo morreu e voce e tem arma portal :) e voce tem que fugir se nao a robozona previamente mencionada ira pegar o seu pinto e ira o cortar fora :)

This game was amazing. The concept of portals and the story... its just one of the best games you can get.

Now we just need number 3...
i already finished it in my X box 360 but ill play it agin on comp
Bought it when it was on sale...
we've seen everything in 2020 except portal 3...

It's still tricky, confounding, it takes a certain type of person to love this game. But I'm definitely on the list.
очень интересная! а если еще и вдвоем то очень крутая и смешная

This game is a portal to a place full of fun.
The best game I've ever played!
Portal 1 mejorado en todos los aspectos.

Great sequel arguably one of the best of all time, i would recommend it immensely, It's amazing on both single player and 
co op modes.

It's an amazing game with great mechanics. Has a lot of puzzles that make you scratch your head for a few minutes and maybe hours. 
10/10 just play it already, it's 2020!!
